name: Sticky Zeitgeist: Episode 2: Aperitif
description:
Episode 2: Aperitif

Controls = WASD/arrow keys + mouse.

20-40 minutes long.

List of episodes on main page. Episode 1 free & playable online.

PC download only but apparently works for some people on Wine. Lowest resolution supported is 1360x768.

Let us know if anything breaks and we'll fix it.
